Moroccan Bonds

Source: R/bonds.R
bonds.Rd

Scraps all the bonds listed in Le Boursier.

bonds()

Value

Returns a data.frame containing :

  • bond_name: name of the bond.

  • issued: number of issued bonds.

  • issuer: the company that issued the bond.

  • full_name: full name of the bond issuer.

  • rate: rate of return.

  • price_ref: first price.

  • price_last: latest price.

Examples

bonds()

#>              bond_name    issued              issuer                                                   full_name   rate price_ref price_last
#> 1         5.12 ONCF 25 241200000          ONCF MAROC                  Office National des Chemins de Fer - Maroc 0.0512    103.20     103.28
